attributes.action: make it illegal for uk Companies to outsource uk jobs abroad, making uk personnel redundant - Keep UK Working!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As more and more companies are outsourcing to cheaper labour workforces abroad, by transferring jobs performed by personnel in the uk to others abroad, and making uk personnel redundant.  The UK is left with rising benefits payments and a rising 'dole' queque.  We are losing our jobs - literally! Our highly educated, trained staff are left in limbo land, even considering retraining is difficult, as what industry is keeping all it's staff nowerdays? never mind the cost implications...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
